sentence.Network_cn: 她躺在楼梯底部，痛得呜咽着。

sentence.Network_cn: 他拎起手提箱,爬上了楼梯.

encyclopedia.content: MATLAB函数stairs简介函数简介 在matlab中stairs函数用于绘制阶梯状图，在图像处理中的直方图均衡化技术中有很大的意义。在matlab的命令窗口中输入doc stairs或者help stairs即可获得该函数的帮助信息。调用格式 stairs(Y) stairs(X,Y) stairs(...,LineSpec) stairs(...,'PropertyName',propertyvalue) stairs(axes_handle,...) h = stairs(...) [xb,yb] = stairs(Y,...) 各种调用格式的详细用法参见matlab的帮助文档。相关函数 s

entry.def: Stairs are a set of steps inside a building which go from one floor to another.

example.ex: Nancy began to climb the stairs...
We walked up a flight of stairs...

entry.def: A stair is a flight of stairs.

example.ex: I followed her down the stair.

entry.def: A stair is one of the steps in a flight of stairs.

example.ex: Terry was sitting on the bottom stair.
example.tran: 特里正坐在最下面的一级楼梯上。

means.word_mean: 1. a way of access consisting of a set of steps
